### Authors and Contributors
The framework was implemented by Axel Ngonga (@ngonga) a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. If you use this framework, please cite 

**Pamela Heidi Douglas, Axel-Cyrille Ngonga Ngomo and Gottfried Hohmann**.
A Novel Approach for Dominance Assessment in Gregarious Species: ADAGIO. Submitted to PLOS Biology.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with ADAGIO? You are on your own :) No, feel free to add a ticket [here](https://github.com/ngonga/adagio).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
